column3: Shelly dashes ahead, skipping a few unnecessary steps!

column7: Shelly's Super shells slow down enemies for 2 seconds!
column9: When Shelly falls below 40% health, she instantly heals for 2220 health. Band-Aid recharges in 15 seconds.
column11: Super Shell is 33% larger.

column3: Colt instantly reloads 2 ammo
column5: Colt's next attack is a powerful shot that deals as much damage as 2 of his regular bullets, while going through obstacles and opponents alike
column7: Colt's movement speed is increased by 13%
column9: Colt's attack range and bullet speed are increased by 11%.
column11: Bullet Storm is 120% wider
